articles.author: Patrick Ryan
articles.title: Oscar rehearsals: America Ferrera's f-bomb, Spielberg's superstition - USA TODAY
articles.description: Sweatpants and heels are the uniform of choice at Academy Awards rehearsals, where A-listers like Zendaya practice for Hollywood's biggest night.
articles.content:
LOS ANGELES Steven Spielberg doesnt want to jinx the Oscars.
Early Saturday morning, the legendary filmmaker strolled out onto the Dolby Theatre stage in sneakers and a crocheted scarf to rehearse f… [+2625 chars]
